sentences.en: a slightly different way of doing things
sentences.cn: 稍有区别的做事方法

sentences.en: American English is significantly different from British English.
sentences.cn: 美国英语与英国英语有很大差异。

sentences.en: Buyers use different ruses to wring free credit out of their suppliers.
sentences.cn: 买主们千方百计想从供货商那儿无息赊购。

sentences.en: Communal violence broke out in different parts of the country.
sentences.cn: 在该国不同的地区发生了群体暴力事件。

sentences.en: He was surprised they had married — they had seemed so different.
sentences.cn: 他俩居然结婚了——这让他非常惊讶，因为他们实在是太不一样了。

sentences.en: He wonders if the different influences might not cancel each other out.
sentences.cn: 他在想，各种影响能不能相互抵消。

sentences.en: I looked it up in three different dictionaries.
sentences.cn: 我分别在三本词典里查找过。

sentences.en: I'm trying to move on and stretch myself with something different.
sentences.cn: 我正想换工作，想尝试点不一样的事情来挑战一下自己。

sentences.en: In Europe, Aga Khan III presented himself in a completely different light.
sentences.cn: 在欧洲，阿迦汗三世表现得完全是另一副样子。

sentences.en: In most languages adjectives have slightly different spellings for masculine and feminine.
sentences.cn: 在多数语言中，形容词的阳性和阴性的拼法略为不同。

sentences.en: It’s a different world here in London.
sentences.cn: 伦敦这儿的情况完全不同。

sentences.en: The evidence of our eyes tells us a different story.
sentences.cn: 我们亲眼所见的可不是那么一回事。

sentences.en: The place looks completely different now.
sentences.cn: 这地方现在完全变了。

sentences.en: The publishing business is no different from any other business in this respect.
sentences.cn: 从这一点来讲，出版业和其他任何行业没有什么差别。

sentences.en: The reality of mothering is frequently very different from the romantic ideal.
sentences.cn: 养育孩子的现实经常与浪漫的理想大相径庭。

sentences.en: The republic is a melting pot of different nationalities.
sentences.cn: 这个共和国是多民族的大熔炉。

sentences.en: The scientists involved put different weight on the conclusions of different models.
sentences.cn: 相关科学家对不同模型的结论给予不同的权重。

sentences.en: The show is refreshingly different from most exhibitions of modern art.
sentences.cn: 这次展览与大多数现代艺术展不一样，令人耳目一新。

sentences.en: There are many different types of fabric.
sentences.cn: 有许多种不同的布料。

sentences.en: These expressions are often used interchangeably, but they do have different meanings.
sentences.cn: 这些表达方式经常相互替代使用，但它们的含义却有所不同。

sentences.en: They are sold in many different colours.
sentences.cn: 这些有多种颜色供选购。

sentences.en: They decided to try a radically different approach.
sentences.cn: 他们决定尝试一种全然不同的办法。

sentences.en: Things might have been different if I'd talked a bit more.
sentences.cn: 如果当时我再多说一点的话，结果或许会不一样。

sentences.en: Use different colours of felt pen on your sketch to avoid confusion.
sentences.cn: 用不同颜色的毡头笔画草图，以免搞混。

sentences.en: We felt we were living life on several different planes.
sentences.cn: 我们感到大家生活的精神层次各不相同。

sentences.en: We found women had significantly different political views from men.
sentences.cn: 我们发现女性的政治观点与男性大不相同。

sentences.en: What actually happened was subtly different from the PR people’s version.
sentences.cn: 实际情况与公关部那些人的说法有细微的差别。

phrases.tran_cn: 种类(或性质、本质)不同处
以不同方式；用不同的方法；通过不同的方式

trans.tran_cn: 有差别的，分别的，各种的，与众不同的
trans.tran_en: not like something or someone else, or not like before
not like something or someone else, or not like before
